fields.original_string: private static final GetPolicyResult GET_POLICY_RESULT = GetPolicyResult.newBuilder().build();

methods.modifiers: @ApiOperation("Find scaling policies for a job") @GetMapping(path = "/scalingPolicies") public
methods.full_signature: @ApiOperation("Find scaling policies for a job") @GetMapping(path = "/scalingPolicies") public GetPolicyResult getAllScalingPolicies(CallMetadataAuthentication authentication)

methods.modifiers: @ApiOperation("Find scaling policies for a job") @GetMapping(path = "/scalingPolicies/{jobId}") public
methods.full_signature: @ApiOperation("Find scaling policies for a job") @GetMapping(path = "/scalingPolicies/{jobId}") public GetPolicyResult getScalingPolicyForJob(@PathVariable("jobId") String jobId, CallMetadataAuthentication authentication)

methods.signature: ScalingPolicyID setScalingPolicy(@RequestBody PutPolicyRequest putPolicyRequest, CallMetadataAuthentication authentication)
methods.full_signature: @ApiOperation("Create or Update scaling policy") @PostMapping(path = "/scalingPolicy") public ScalingPolicyID setScalingPolicy(@RequestBody PutPolicyRequest putPolicyRequest, CallMetadataAuthentication authentication)

methods.modifiers: @ApiOperation("Find scaling policy for a policy Id") @GetMapping(path = "scalingPolicy/{policyId}") public
methods.full_signature: @ApiOperation("Find scaling policy for a policy Id") @GetMapping(path = "scalingPolicy/{policyId}") public GetPolicyResult getScalingPolicy(@PathVariable("policyId") String policyId, CallMetadataAuthentication authentication)

methods.signature: ResponseEntity<Void> removePolicy(@PathVariable("policyId") String policyId, CallMetadataAuthentication authentication)
methods.full_signature: @ApiOperation("Delete scaling policy") @DeleteMapping(path = "scalingPolicy/{policyId}") public ResponseEntity<Void> removePolicy(@PathVariable("policyId") String policyId, CallMetadataAuthentication authentication)

methods.signature: ResponseEntity<Void> updateScalingPolicy(@RequestBody UpdatePolicyRequest updatePolicyRequest, CallMetadataAuthentication authentication)
methods.full_signature: @ApiOperation("Update scaling policy") @PutMapping("scalingPolicy") public ResponseEntity<Void> updateScalingPolicy(@RequestBody UpdatePolicyRequest updatePolicyRequest, CallMetadataAuthentication authentication)

focal_method.modifiers: @ApiOperation("Find scaling policy for a policy Id") @GetMapping(path = "scalingPolicy/{policyId}") public
focal_method.full_signature: @ApiOperation("Find scaling policy for a policy Id") @GetMapping(path = "scalingPolicy/{policyId}") public GetPolicyResult getScalingPolicy(@PathVariable("policyId") String policyId, CallMetadataAuthentication authentication)
